advancements.loot_n_explore.amphitrite_d: Find this shiny diadem, in buried shipwrecks, plundered by pirates.
advancements.loot_n_explore.charged_amet: Take a look at every amethyst cluster, there might be some charged crystals.
advancements.loot_n_explore.corrupted_en: Some Enderman carry a corrupted pearl from the end dimension.
advancements.loot_n_explore.elder_guardi: Slay the Elder Guardian to receive his eye and craft a powerful weapon!
advancements.loot_n_explore.ender_dragon: Be victorious against the Ender Dragon, use the dragon's scales to craft a powerful weapon!
The Ender Dragon's Tooth's are scattered across end cities.
advancements.loot_n_explore.eternal_snow: This snowflake cannot melt, they were collected in igloos.
advancements.loot_n_explore.find_inn.des: Find a Inn, take a drink and rest!
advancements.loot_n_explore.find_poseido: In lost underwater ruins, you may find this ancient relic.
advancements.loot_n_explore.frost_monarc: Kill the Frost Monarch in his temple. Summon him by placing his crown on the frozensouls block.
advancements.loot_n_explore.frozen_key.d: Unlock a Frozen Vault with an Frozen Key
advancements.loot_n_explore.frozen_rib.d: Master the obstacles in the glacial tomb to obtain the frozen ribs of Frosthaunt's from their frozen vaults.
Take the Frozen Soul from the Frostmonarch to craft a powerful weapon!
advancements.loot_n_explore.generic_temp: Craft the Smithing Template with the 3 relic items listed before.
advancements.loot_n_explore.glacial_tomb: Find and explore the glacial tomb
advancements.loot_n_explore.glacier_shar: Glacial Shards are protected by Glaze's in their tower spawners.
advancements.loot_n_explore.glaze.descri: Kill the Glaze in the Glaze Tower, beware it will hail frost balls.
advancements.loot_n_explore.glaze.title: The freezing Glaze!
advancements.loot_n_explore.lost_soul.de: Wither skeletons collect the souls of lost adventures.
advancements.loot_n_explore.monarchs_key: Unlock a Ominous Frozen Vault with an Monarchs Key
advancements.loot_n_explore.rainbow_cora: You may find these rare corals in buried treasure chests.
advancements.loot_n_explore.root.equipme: Start your journey and explore the world!
advancements.loot_n_explore.root.explora: Start your journey and explore the world!
advancements.loot_n_explore.smith_dragon: These weapons pulsate with the essence of the end, holding the power to rend dimensions.
advancements.loot_n_explore.smith_glacia: Forged from a frozen soul, these weapons carry a chilling wrath of eternal winter.
advancements.loot_n_explore.smith_guardi: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of an Abyssal Cove.
advancements.loot_n_explore.smith_wither: Crafted from shattered Wither remains, imbued with the eternal curse of the Nether.
advancements.loot_n_explore.unknown_rema: Even skeletons once had a name and were someone.
advancements.loot_n_explore.wither_spine: Stand strong against the Wither and take his remains to craft a powerful weapon!
advancements.loot_n_explore.withered_obs: Piglins don't just like gold, they collect these magical shards in their bastion with their treasures.
effect.loot_n_explore.crusaders_rest.des: Increases Spell Healing Power, Attack Damage and Max Health.
effect.loot_n_explore.dettlaffs_blood.de: Increases Attack Damage and Melee Lifesteal.
effect.loot_n_explore.ender_dragon_scale: Regenerates Health and reduces incoming damage.
effect.loot_n_explore.espresso.descripti: Increases Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
effect.loot_n_explore.forrest_spirit.des: Increases Ranged Weapon Damage and Ranged Weapon Haste.
effect.loot_n_explore.frost_resistance.d: Removes all Frozen Ticks as long as this effect is active.
Increases Attack Damage, Attack Speed and Knockback Resistance.
effect.loot_n_explore.merlins_flask.desc: Increases Spell Power, Spell Haste and Spell Critical Damage.
effect.loot_n_explore.scarlet_essence.de: Increases Spell Power and Spell Vampire.
effect.loot_n_explore.svablods_brew.desc: Increases Rage, Attack Damage and Attack Speed.
effect.loot_n_explore.the_unshakable.des: Increasing Knockback Resistance, Armor Toughness and Max Health.
effect.loot_n_explore.vital_drink.descri: Increases Armor Toughness and Max Health.
effect.loot_n_explore.white_wolf.descrip: Increases Sign Intensity, Adrenaline and Attack Damage.
effect.loot_n_explore.withers_curse.desc: Increases Incoming Damage, the amplifier increases with each harmful status effect.
effect.loot_n_explore.wizards_elixir.des: Increases Spell Power and Spell Haste.
effect.loot_n_explore.woodsnake_potion.d: Increases Ranged Damage, Ranged Haste and Arrow Velocity.
filled_map.loot_n_explore.monster_quest: Please help us eliminate the threats nearby!
item.loot_n_explore.crusaders_rest.lore: Distributed by the Holy Church for the highest Knights Templar.
item.loot_n_explore.dettlaffs_blood.lore: A crimson draught that ignites bloodlust and grants lifesteal with every furious blow.
item.loot_n_explore.knights_favourite.lo: A special dish with which no knight has ever lost.
item.loot_n_explore.merlins_flask.lore: Perfectly assembled by Merlin the Wizard for highest performance.
item.loot_n_explore.scarlet_essence.lore: A rare, almost sacred substance that blesses spells with magical blood steal.
item.loot_n_explore.svablods_brew.lore: Brewed by Northern Cultists with Mardroeme.
item.loot_n_explore.the_unshakable.lore: For the knights of the front line, they cannot be stopped.
item.loot_n_explore.white_wolf.lore: Excellent wine from Toussaint, named after the legendary witcher Geralt of Riva.
item.loot_n_explore.woodsnake_potion.lor: Brewed with the skin of a wood snake by a legendary druid.
lore.loot_n_explore.elder_guardian_weapo: Formed over the ages deep within the watery sands of an Abyssal Cove.
lore.loot_n_explore.ender_dragon_weapon: This weapon pulses with the essence of the end, holding the power to rend dimensions.
lore.loot_n_explore.glacial_weapon: Forged from a frozen soul, it carries a chilling wrath of eternal winter.
lore.loot_n_explore.wither_weapon: Crafted from shattered Wither remains, imbued with the eternal curse of the Nether.
spell.loot_n_explore.avalanche.descripti: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} chance to spawn a small avalanche, dealing {damage} damage and inflicting freezing for {effect_duration}.
spell.loot_n_explore.avalanche.name: Avalanche
spell.loot_n_explore.dragonclaw.descript: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} chance to deal extra {damage} to the target damage and heals the user for {heal} hearts.
spell.loot_n_explore.dragonclaw.name: Dragonclaw
Use: Cast a Guardian Beam dealing {damage} damage and lowering the attack damage for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.loot_n_explore.ender_dragon_scales: Use: Regenerates your health for {effect_duration} seconds and reducing incoming damage for 20%%.
spell.loot_n_explore.enderman_teleport.d: Use: Teleports you forwards for {teleport_distance} blocks.
spell.loot_n_explore.frozen_soul.descrip: Use: Creates a powerful freezing storm for {cloud_duration} seconds, freezing the targets.
spell.loot_n_explore.frozen_soul.name: Monarch's Freezing Storm
spell.loot_n_explore.frozen_touch.descri: On Taking damage {trigger_chance} chance, to inflict freezing on the attacker for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.loot_n_explore.frozen_touch.name: Frozen Touch
spell.loot_n_explore.poseidons_grace.des: On taking damage: {trigger_chance} chance to heal the player for {heal} hearts, if the player is below 50%% health.
spell.loot_n_explore.waterbomb.descripti: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} chance to deal {damage} damage around the target.
spell.loot_n_explore.waterbomb.name: Waterbomb
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_pulse.descri: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} inflicts targets in a 90 degree radius with Wither and dealing {damage} damage.
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_pulse.name: Wither Pulse
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_spine.descri: Use: Shoots a Wither Skull dealing {damage} damage and inflicting wither for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_spine.name: Wither's Skull
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_touch.descri: On Taking damage {trigger_chance} chance, to inflict wither on the attacker for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.loot_n_explore.wither_touch.name: Wither's Touch
